title: Deploy frontend and backend to Internet Computer production network

requirements.text: Deploy the backend Motoko canister and frontend React application to the Internet Computer production network (mainnet).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister is successfully deployed to the IC mainnet and accessible via its canister ID.
Frontend assets are deployed to the IC mainnet and served from the production canister URL.
The deployed frontend correctly connects to the deployed backend canister on mainnet.
All existing routes and features function correctly on the production deployment.

constraints: Do not modify any application logic, data models, or UI components as part of this deployment task.
Preserve all existing SEO metadata, sitemap, and robots.txt configurations.
nonGoals: Adding new features or modifying existing functionality.
Changing the backend data schema or frontend UI design.
Setting up staging or test environments.
